name: Traveling to Europa with a Tiktaalik
name_original: Traveling to Europa with a Tiktaalik
description:
I started this with the intention of making a small, cozy game to learn the basics of Twine. It's still pretty small, but thoughts about isolation, anxiety, and making difficult decisions crept into it; probably unsurprisingly given the 2020-21 time-frame. Nonetheless, it remains kind of cozy...

Works best in full-screen.

Made with Twine 2. Background images from NASA.
